About AkhileshCab

Your trusted transportation partner in Varanasi since 2015

AkhileshCab is a premier cab service in Varanasi established with the aim of providing safe, reliable, and comfortable transportation to tourists and locals alike. Founded by Mr. Akhilesh Kumar, a Varanasi native with over 15 years of experience in the tourism industry, our service prides itself on deep local knowledge and exceptional customer care.

Our mission is to showcase the rich cultural heritage of Varanasi while ensuring travelers experience the city's spiritual essence in comfort and safety. We maintain clean, air-conditioned vehicles and employ professional drivers who are fluent in multiple languages to cater to international tourists.

Our Vehicle

Comfortable, clean, and well-maintained car for your journey

Toyota Etios

Type: Sedan
Seating Capacity: 4 passengers
AC: Yes
Luggage Space: 3 medium suitcases
Year: 2021
Additional Features: Bottle water, First aid kit, Mobile charger

Our Toyota Etios offers the perfect balance of comfort, reliability, and efficiency. The spacious interior makes it ideal for city tours and airport transfers, while the well-maintained condition ensures a smooth ride throughout your journey in Varanasi.

Our Service Area

We cover all of Varanasi and surrounding regions

Areas We Cover:

  • Varanasi City
  • Sarnath (13 km)
  • Ramnagar (14 km)
  • Dashashwamedh Ghat
  • Assi Ghat
  • Manikarnika Ghat
  • Banaras Hindu University
  • Kashi Vishwanath Temple
  • Lal Bahadur Shastri Airport (26 km)
  • Varanasi Junction Railway Station
  • Gaya (252 km - long distance)
  • Allahabad/Prayagraj (120 km - long distance)

Don't see your destination? Contact us - we can likely accommodate your needs!
